As Aerotaur dropped straight in his line of fire, Owlhawk expression
soured faster than it had ever taken for Starscream to scheme
something up.

As his ally dropped to the ground, he decided to take things personal.
He pushed himself forward and hurled himself at the spy with the speed
and force of a meteor, ready to throw a punch.

Owlhawk: Windlord! Try to stabilize him enough for me to attend him!
That was no ordinary weapon!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "AEROTAUR!!!!!!!!!" shouted anguised when he saw his friend collapse, 
> he ran towards him in order to help him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > OOC: Sorry about the other one... dumbass AOL
> > 
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He sees Flicker flipping over him and before Flicker lands 
> he executes 
> > a quick backflip over Flicker.  He lands behind him and raises his 
> arm a 
> > small blaster popping out of the back of it.  "Don't I though?"
> > 
> >        Unfortunately this flip put him directly in the line of fire 
> from 
> > Owlhawk.  The series of blasts catch him square in the back and he 
> winces 
> > lowering his arm.  He finally collapses to his knees and falls 
> forward onto 
> > Nightlight and, possibly, Flicker's legs.
